statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -16 \\ -6 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -32 \\ -9 \\ 28 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
